item.title: Opensuse安装vmware Workstation Pro
item.author: Laphael
item.description: 安装相关的系统依赖 1 sudo zypper install kernel-source kernel-devel gcc 开始安装 添加可执行权限 1 chmod +x VMware-Workstation-Full-17.0.2-21581411.x86_64.bundle 安装 1 sudo ./VMware-Workstation-Full-17.0.2-21581411.x86_64.bundle
